ModMetaData.name: Packs Are Not Belts
ModMetaData.author: Turnovus
ModMetaData.description:
Moves the jump pack, low-shield, and some modded packs to the torso slot so they can be worn with belts.
Also moves the exoskeleton frame from VWE Heavy to its own layer, and some Rimmu-Nation items away from the torso, so they can still be worn with other utilities.
